metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you see one such item. This one is the Cowl of Menzobarranzan.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That drow cowl might have bits of magic lingering inside it. Any thoughts, Gale?

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Drow magic radiates from it. And drow are masters at magic.
